alert.note: Alert for Niihau in Kauai (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 29 at 11:11AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM HST THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE ISLAND OF KAUAI IN KAUAI COUNTY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...The island of Kauai in Kauai County. * WHEN...Until 230 PM HST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding on roads, poor drainage areas, and in streams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1107 AM HST, radar indicated heavy rain over many locations across the southern half of the island of Kauai. Rain was falling at a rate of 1 to 3 inches per hour. Stream levels are rising in response to this rainfall, prompting continuance of this Flood Advisory. - This Flood Advisory covers the entire island of Kauai. This advisory may need to be extended beyond 230 PM HST if flooding persists.
info.instruction: Stay away from streams, drainage ditches and low lying areas prone to flooding.
